name: Kinja Run
description:
A brave Ninja cat, running into a path full of monsters!
The world’s first runner and shoot-em-up! Run and dodge missiles!

Features:
- Run and Auto Battle
- No extra controls
- Easy to play, hard to master
- Roguelike Runner
- Shoot-em-up
- RPG Progression

Contact Us: kinjarun@habby.com
Facebook: @Kinja Run
